name: 1000 Light Years [Browser Version]
description:
1000 Light Years is a game made in 2 weeks.

You and your crew are the only survivors of an alien attack. Will you be able to reach earth before they reach you ?

Just remember that in space it can get really bad really fast.

This is the browser version of the game.

Sould you wish to download it, you can find it here :

https://maxence-jacquot.itch.io/1000lightyears

It's free as always ;)

(But who would whant to dowload it anyway ?)

Feel free to add any feedback, bug report or highscores in the comments :D
